title: Dodge bug inquiry

embed.description: Fencer / Gold 5 30LP / 13W 8L Win Ratio 62% / Talon - 5W 0L Win Ratio 100%, Garen - 1W 0L Win Ratio 100%, Nasus - 1W 0L Win Ratio 100%, Singed - 1W 0L Win Ratio 100%, Jax - 1W 0L Win Ratio 100%

body: I played Dodge 2 seconds before I played the game, but it did not work so I played the game.And won the game, but I was marked off with a 20 minute escape penalty and escape. I want you to judge my Shako game entirely.

replies.body: It sounds like you were probably afk for the first minutes of the game in that case?
